code:
import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import translationsInFinnish from'../locales/fi/translation.json';import translationsInEnglish from'../locales/en/translation.json';// the translations
const resources={fi:{translation:translationsInFinnish},en:{translation:translationsInEnglish}};i18n.use(initReactI18next)// passes i18n down to react-i18next
.init({resources,// resources are important to load translations for the languages.
lng:"en",// It acts as default language. When the site loads, content is shown in this language.  
debug:true,fallbackLng:"fi",// use if selected language is not available
interpolation:{escapeValue:false},ns:"translation",// namespaces help to divide huge translations into multiple small files.
defaultNS:"translation"});export default i18n;
